channel.title: What Should Rune-Chaos Server Base Be?
channel.description:
[img]http://www.zarosath.info/images/Rune-Chaos_banner.jpg[/img] Now, I Have Been Trying To Make A Desision Weather I Should Use Devolution Server V7 By Bakatool/Winten ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,257348.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,257348.0.html[/url]) or RuneJava Base Source V3.0B By Desider ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,249714.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,249714.0.html[/url]) [b][u]Features[/u][/b] [b]RuneJava Base V3.0B[/b] * Catherby based. [Not seen much.] * New Commands for Owner's special editing use. [:: gfx# | :: object# | :: emote # | :: pickup #] * You work for your money and/or skills. [Greatly Effects economy.] * Fishing [SUCCESFUL.] * Thieving [SUCCESFUL.] * Range [SUCCESFUL.] * Combat [SUCCESFUL.] * Mining [SUCCESFUL.] * Farming [BASIC CODE.] * Fletching [SUCCESFUL.] * Smithing [SUCCESFUL.] * Woodcutting [SUCCESFUL.] * FireMaking [SUCCESFUL.] * Cooking [SUCCESFUL.] * Magic [SUCCESFUL.] * Perfect Banking. * Perfect Picking Up. * ::train XP SKILLID [Perfect, better then ::master.] * Build on this source and create a great server. * A lot of skills, unlike them lame leeched servers which rely on their PvP combat to attract visitors. [Will STAY LIKE THIS.] * No overpowered shops. [More professional economy.] * Very Stable server with small amount of bugs. [Great for loads of Users.] * ::cat command, follows you around. [Credits to ReenScape] And Many Other Features (Not Including Antihack/flooder/crasher/nuller witch i can add myself) [b]Devolution Server V7[/b]
specs proper follow no bugs! proper player facing npcs proper npc facing players auto retaliate full magic and ranged good boss's with rare drops fixed good glitches and added real timers all silab/jagex items full item level requirements ( all items are handled in lvlhandler ) 370kb client! normal dodian clients are 500kb 34kb npchandler! normal dodian npchandlers are 64kb every single java file has been cut back to give maxium preformance all npcs attack players with there real emotes, and die using there real emotes barrows area fully working picking up items! average computer can hold around 50 players also trading fixed
And All The Features Devolution Server Has On Bakatool's post/Dodian's Server So Put Your Votes, And Try To Keep This Thread Active [b]WITHOUT[/b] Spam Or Flaming Please.

item.title: What Should Rune-Chaos Server Base Be?
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Personally i think you should get a different source,

no idea which,

and buff it up, to a good standard.

Just so u can have some comands cases etc, instead of making your owner

Also i dont like devolution so other source

Goodluck to you m8
—The Dark Abbys—

Read full topic

item.title: What Should Rune-Chaos Server Base Be?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3 runescape3
item.description:
@runescape3 wrote:

Now, I Have Been Trying To Make A Desision Weather I Should Use Devolution Server V7 By Bakatool/Winten (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,257348.0.html)

or RuneJava Base Source V3.0B By Desider (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,249714.0.html)

Features

RuneJava Base V3.0B

* Catherby based. [Not seen much.]
* New Commands for Owner's special editing use. [:: gfx# | :: object# | :: emote # | :: pickup #]
* You work for your money and/or skills. [Greatly Effects economy.]
* Fishing [SUCCESFUL.]
* Thieving [SUCCESFUL.]
* Range [SUCCESFUL.]
* Combat [SUCCESFUL.]
* Mining [SUCCESFUL.]
* Farming [BASIC CODE.]
* Fletching [SUCCESFUL.]
* Smithing [SUCCESFUL.]
* Woodcutting [SUCCESFUL.]
* FireMaking [SUCCESFUL.]
* Cooking [SUCCESFUL.]
* Magic [SUCCESFUL.]
* Perfect Banking.
* Perfect Picking Up.
* ::train XP SKILLID [Perfect, better then ::master.]
* Build on this source and create a great server.
* A lot of skills, unlike them lame leeched servers which rely on their PvP combat to attract visitors. [Will STAY LIKE THIS.]
* No overpowered shops. [More professional economy.]
* Very Stable server with small amount of bugs. [Great for loads of Users.]
* ::cat command, follows you around. [Credits to ReenScape]

And Many Other Features (Not Including Antihack/flooder/crasher/nuller witch i can add myself)

Devolution Server V7

specs proper follow no bugs! proper player facing npcs proper npc facing players auto retaliate full magic and ranged good boss's with rare drops fixed good glitches and added real timers all silab/jagex items full item level requirements ( all items are handled in lvlhandler ) 370kb client! normal dodian clients are 500kb 34kb npchandler! normal dodian npchandlers are 64kb every single java file has been cut back to give maxium preformance all npcs attack players with there real emotes, and die using there real emotes barrows area fully working picking up items! average computer can hold around 50 players also trading fixed

And All The Features Devolution Server Has On Bakatool’s post/Dodian’s Server

So Put Your Votes, And Try To Keep This Thread Active WITHOUT Spam Or Flaming Please.

Read full topic
item.source: What Should Rune-Chaos Server Base Be?
